Text: Am I the only one that isn't really excited with the death of Peter Parker? For so many years we saw a funny character and that was his great characteristic. Now he is just smart and nothing more. I really hope they will bring Peter Parker back to life soon.
I don't see how anyone could think this anything more than an event to stir up more sales, that ultimately will end in a year if that.

it's just bleh. i read 700, superior, and the daredevil guest appearance. octospidey is pointless. not sad, not meaningful, not worth raging over. just pointless.

the internet will break if he rapes mj in 2 weeks though!

Correct me if I'm getting this wrong.
But, I think the last page of Superior Spider-Man shows that Peter's still around & is the cause of "Spider-Man's" reflexive "Heroics". Also, he's sworn to get his body back.

I guess THAT is how they intend to keep the viewers interested.
so why bother having a hero die heroically if it lasts 21 pages of "story time" (2 weeks in "real world" / publisher time)?
